nodes.text: The droid toxin emitter was a utility item in the form of a small canister that fit under a droid's plating and released a small cloud of toxic gas when activated. This had the effect of poisoning and paralyzing organics for a short period of time.
In Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords, a droid must be at upgrade class 2 to be able to equip this item.
